headline: Costco Sales Topped $250 Billion in Fiscal 2024. But Less Than 2% of Those Sales Are Key to Understanding the Entire Business.
summary: Costco Wholesale (NASDAQ: COST) operates around 900 warehouse-style retail stores around the world.  This makes Costco one of the largest businesses on the entire planet.  Just to put its revenue number into perspective, the company generated as much revenue as Procter & Gamble, Johnson & Johnson, Netflix, and The Coca-Cola Company combined.
